description: The image shows a skin lesion with a brown, somewhat irregular shape. It is surrounded by normal skin and numerous hairs. The lesion appears to have a relatively uniform color, but with some variation in intensity. It appears to be a flat lesion, with no signs of raised or irregular borders. There are some fine, white, scaly-like structures visible on the surface of the lesion.

The image shows a skin lesion with a central dark brown area surrounded by lighter skin. There are five purple markings around the lesion, some of which appear to be irregular and have a slightly jagged edge. The background skin is light with a fine network of white lines and some small dark spots. The lesion appears to be approximately 1 mm in diameter.

The image shows a skin lesion with a pinkish, slightly raised appearance. It has a somewhat irregular border and appears to be surrounded by hair follicles. There are some areas of scale or crusting on the surface, and a few small, dark spots are also visible. The lesion appears to be approximately 3-4 mm in diameter, as indicated by the scale bar in the image.

The lesion is a small, round, brownish spot with a central, darker, branching structure. It appears to be located within a pinkish, slightly raised area of skin. There are a few hairs visible in the surrounding skin. The lesion is approximately 1-2 mm in diameter.

The lesion is a small, round, brown macule with a slightly irregular border. It appears to be a benign melanocytic lesion. There is a small, lighter area in the center of the lesion. The surrounding skin is pale with some fine hairs and small brown spots.

The lesion is a raised, dark, and crusted nodule with a rough, irregular surface. It appears to be located on the face, surrounded by skin with multiple freckles and moles. There is a hair growing from the lesion.

The lesion appears to be a skin growth with irregular borders and a central area of crusting or ulceration. There are also surrounding areas of redness and some small, dark spots. The skin around the lesion is also sun-damaged with fine lines and age spots.

There are multiple lesions present. Some appear as raised, pinkish, scaly patches with a slightly irregular border. One lesion has a dark, possibly crusted, center. Another lesion has a central, slightly depressed, darker area. There is also a small, linear, reddish wound with a scab. The skin around the lesions is dry and has visible hair follicles.

The image shows an area of skin with a rough, textured surface. There are visible small bumps or papules, and the skin appears slightly discolored with a pinkish or reddish tone. The area is not raised or inflamed, but rather appears to be a slightly uneven surface.

The lesion is a raised, circular, pinkish-red nodule with a crusted, whitish center. The surrounding skin shows signs of sun damage with freckling and age spots. There is a small area of surrounding redness. The nodule appears to be well-defined and has a slightly irregular border.

The lesion is a small, round, dark brown to black spot with a slightly irregular border. There is also a small, red area within the lesion. The surrounding skin is light with several other small, brown spots and freckles.

The lesion is a small, brown, roundish spot with a slightly irregular border. It appears to be a mole or nevus. There are also several other smaller, darker spots and a few hairs visible in the image.
The image shows a small, dark brown, round lesion with a smooth border. It appears to be a mole or nevus. The surrounding skin is light-toned and shows fine wrinkles.

There are numerous small, raised, brownish lesions scattered across the skin. Some appear to have a slightly waxy or keratotic appearance. There is also a dark, almost black, small lesion with a somewhat irregular border. There are also some areas of redness and a few small, dark spots.
The lesion is a small, dark, almost black, round or slightly irregular shape. It appears to be a raised, well-defined spot on the skin. The surrounding skin is light and hairy.
